...all u can eat

Get ur bellies ready...

There are different kinds of foods -- foods that will make you belch, foods that will make you stuffed and foods that will make you hunger for more... Try them all in your very own eatties. It's not ours, it's yours.

We open on...

Everyday of the week (except Sundays) from 6 am till 12 midnight. We cover both the early birds and the late owls. We take orders anytime but we keep to the working hours for deliveries.

We stay at...

Maryland, Ogui road, Enugu.

Hol' your side with...

Eba, akpu, semo, pounded yam, and the various soups

Rock your party with...

Your very ol' rice in all its forms

Shake up your diet with...

Our other delicacies

And that's not all...

We've got extras -- fried plantain, fried potato, fried yam, roasted fish, fried fish, fried meat, boiled meat, chicken, turkey -- to make your meal even bigger.

What about taking it all down? We've got you covered -- soft drinks, hard drinks, firm drinks ;)

All for a steal...

Just #400 for any meal at all! Cheap, right? We're letting you rob us -- because it's your eatties.

Extras will cost extra depending on the quantity. Deliveries within Maryland are free! Deliveries outside of Maryland will cost a variable token based on the distance.

Place your order...

A man's first heart is his stomach
